original_text: And all the women that were wise hearted did spin with their hands, and brought that which they had spun, both of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine linen.
korean_text: 마음이 슬기로운 모든 여인은 손수 실을 빼고 그 뺀 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가는 베 실을 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: And all the women that were wise hearted
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 지혜로운 마음을 가진 여인들은

sentences.original_text: and brought that which they had spun
both of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet
